abilityDescription: Automatically shares endless streams of 'educational aid' content, so no one else gets a chance to complain about the real work you’re not doing.
attackDescription: Launches a barrage of painfully detailed tech tweets that only confuse and bore your opponent to sleep. Who knew debugging could be weaponized into such a snoozefest?
description: The user is a developer and educator with a heavy tech and engineering theme, frequently sharing detailed open-source projects and engineering advice. Their tweets are technical and informative, suggesting a strong resistance to confusion since they thrive in clear, complex explanations — hence the 'psyop' resist. Their ability mocks their relentless 'helpful' educational content that ironically can drown out meaningful interaction. The attack is a sarcastic jab at their tendency to flood timelines with over-technical debugging and development posts that act like a mental 'psyop' attack on followers who aren't engineers. The user is vulnerable to sharp roasts because their serious nerd tone and technical pride make them sensitive to biting commentary on their oversharing and niche focus.
